title: The Urge
content:
e ward will also fail and kill Jaheira and Isobel the Cleric off-screen. This will count to satisfy the urge. If you fail to control your Slayer Form, you may kill your Lover. Other notes, tips, and trivia for The Dark Urge go here.

How to unlock The Urge

Events are multiple and random. Instances will be listed as they go.

The Urge Rewards

The Deathstalker Mantle for killing Alfira. The Slayer Form for killing Isobel, The Cleric in the Last Light Inn.
